song.title: Smashcid
song.info:
Quickly made for a short demo, "Retrofit08" by Artificial Interrupt at Grep Brown 2011.
Bassline made with C64 and two 8580 SID chips (panned at left and right), using MSSIAH's Bassline synth. Drums made with Madtracker 2, and the rest done in Cubase Essential 5 (including quick'n'dirty mixing).
Download & stream: http://dvibe.se/smashcid_popup.html
